text: "Baby Boy" is a song recorded by Danish Eurodance act Me & My. It was released in 1995 as the second single from the eponymous album. The single was a moderate success in many European countries, reaching number-one in Denmark and Hungary. It also reached number 3 in Finland, number 10 in Belgium and number 30 in Austria. On the Eurochart Hot 100, the song peaked at number 60 in March 1996. Music & Media described the song as "equally up-tempo and infectious" as their first single, "Dub-I-Dub". The memorable music video features Me & My dressed like cats and nuns. In 2007, the single was included on the band's best of album, The Ultimate Collection. ==Track listing== Me & My in the "Baby Boy" music video. ==Charts and certifications== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1995–96) !Peak position |- |- |- |- |Denmark (IFPI) |align="center"|1 |- |Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |align="center"|60 |- |Finland (Suomen virallinen lista) |align="center"|3 |- |Hungary (Mahasz) |align="center"|1 |- |Netherlands (Tipparade) |align="center"|7 |- |Netherlands (Mega Top 100) |align="center"|37 |- |- |- |} ===Certification=== ==References== Category:1995 singles Category:1995 songs Category:Me & My songs Category:EMI Records singles Category:Number-one singles in Denmark Category:Number-one singles in Hungary
title: Baby Boy (Me & My song)
